name: Cocoa-Touch-Barcodes
summary: A set of classes for generating two-dimensional barcodes
description: This is a fork of Jeff Lamarche's Cocoa Barcodes project, with the code modified to work on the iPhone and iPad. In my testing, a CCD and laser scanner can read UPC and Code 128 barcodes directly from the screen w/ no issue. I haven't tested other barcodes yet.
